request.description:
## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for signup into system.

## EndPoint:

##### /api/auth/signup

## Request body:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| name | user name | true | string |
| email | user email | true | string |
| password | user password | true | string |

#### Note:

first user will register will register as admin after that will register as operator

## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for login into system.

## EndPoint:

##### /api/auth/login

## Request body:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| password | user password | true | string |
| email | user email | true | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for logout from system.

## EndPoint:

##### /api/auth/logout

## Request body:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| token | refreshToken | true | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for generate new accessToken.

## EndPoint:

##### /api/auth/refresh-token

## Request body:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| token | refreshToken | true | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for send rest password email.

## EndPoint:

##### /api/auth/rest-password

## Request body:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| email | user email | true | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions: this endpoint used for rest password. ## EndPoint: ##### /api/auth/rest-password/:token ## Request param: | Field | Descriptions | required | type | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | token | rest password
token gnreated from send email | true | string | ## Request body: | Field | Descriptions | required | type | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | password | new password | true | string |

item.name: user

request.description:
## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for get user.

## EndPoint:

##### /api/users/:id

## Request param:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| id | user id | true | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions: this endpoint used get many users ## EndPoint: ##### /api/users ## Request query: | Field | Descriptions | required | type | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | limit | records number ber requset.
defulte = 10 | false | number | | page | page number.
defulte = 1 | false | number | | name | user name | false | string | | email | user email | false | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for update crruent user data.

## EndPoint:

##### /api/users

## Request body:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| name | user name | false | string |
| email | user email | true | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions: this endpoint used for create a new user. ## EndPoint: ##### /api/users ## Request body: | Field | Descriptions | required | type | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | name | user name | true | string | | email | user email | true | string | | password | user password | true | string | | role | user role
valid values (
admin ,operator
) | true | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for update user data.

## EndPoint:

##### /api/users/:id

## Request param:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| id | user id | true | number |

## Request body:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| name | user name | false | string |
| email | user email | true | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions: this endpoint used for update user role. ## EndPoint: ##### /api/users/:id ## Request param: | Field | Descriptions | required | type | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | id | user id | true | number | ## Request body: | Field | Descriptions | required | type | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | role | user role
valid values (
admin ,operator
)e | true | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for delete user.

## EndPoint:

##### /api/users/:id

## Request param:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| id | user id | true | number |

item.description: API endpoints to mange shelf location in the library

request.description:
## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for create a book

## EndPoint:

##### /api/books

## Request body:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| title | book name | true | string |
| author | book author name | true | string |
| ISBN | book ISBN | true | string |
| qty | available quantity | true | number |
| row_id | row id "shelf location" | true | number |

## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for update book

## EndPoint:

##### /api/books/:id

## Request Params:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| id | book id | true | number |

## Request body:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| title | book name | false | string |
| author | book author name | false | string |
| ISBN | book ISBN | false | string |
| qty | available quantity | false | number |
| row_id | row id "shelf location" | false | number |

## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for delete a book

## EndPoint:

##### /api/books/:id

## Request param:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| id | book id | true | number |

## Endpoint Descriptions: this endpoint used for get or search in books ## EndPoint: ##### /api/books ## Request query: | Field | Descriptions | required | type | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | limit | records number ber requset.
defulte = 10 | false | number | | page | page number.
defulte = 1 | false | number | | title | book name | false | string | | author | book author name | false | string | | ISBN | book ISBN | false | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for get book

## EndPoint:

##### /api/books/:id

## Request Params:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| id | book id | true | number |

item.name: borrows

request.description:
## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint used for create allow user to borrow a book

## EndPoint:

##### /api/borrows

## Request body:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| name | book id | true | number |
| checkout_date | borrow start date | true | string |
| due_date | borrow end date | true | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions:

this endpoint allows user return book

## EndPoint:

##### /api/borrows/:id

## Request param:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| id | book borrow ID | true | number |

## Request body:

| Field | Descriptions | required | type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| newName | entity new name | true | string |

## Endpoint Descriptions: this endpoint use for get all books user still have them ## EndPoint: ##### /api/borrows/user ## Request query: | Field | Descriptions | required | type | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | limit | records number ber requset.
defulte = 10 | false | number | | page | page number.
defulte = 1 | false | number |
